trivias.trivia: Horses can sleep both lying down and standing up
Horses can grow a mustache
A baby horse is called a Foal
Their kicking force is estimated to be 2, 000 psi, with an average speed of 200 miles per hour<
Some salamanders can breathe through their skin
Salamanders are cannibals. They will eat other salamanders that are smaller than themselves when given the opportunity
Salamanders are capable of regenerating lost limbs
The Earliest Salamander Species Lived Before the Dinosaurs<
Their sense of smell is at least 40x better than ours
Dogs have 18 muscles controlling their ears
Dogs dream
Dogs Can Sweat Through Their Paws <
Cats sleep for around 13 to 16 hours a day (70% of their life)
They have a total of 18 toes
Each cat's nose is unique, much like human fingerprints
Cats can jump 5 times their height
Thet Communicate through vibrations through their feet
An elephant never forgets
Each elephant has completely unique ears
They have a poor hearing, despite having such large ears <
